name: get_stream_mature_content_status
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gwyo_twitch.
Tool description: This API gives access to informations about a User / Channel, and Streams on Twitch.
API description: Get Stream Mature Content Status (using username or id)
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )

userid.description: The Twitch username or ID of the user whose stream status is to be checked.
